org.usfirst.frc2084.CMonster2014.drive

Class FourWheelDriveController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc2084.CMonster2014.drive.DriveController
      • org.usfirst.frc2084.CMonster2014.drive.FourWheelDriveController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.MotorSafety

    public class FourWheelDriveController
extends DriveController
    Drive controller for robots with four wheels. Allows control over each side together or each wheel independently.
    Author:
    Ben Wolsieffer

                                WheelController rearLeftWheel,
                                WheelController rearRightWheel)
        Creates a new FourWheelDriveController with the specified WheelControllers.
        Parameters:
        frontLeftWheel - the front left WheelController
        frontRightWheel - the front right WheelController
        rearLeftWheel - the rear left WheelController
        rearRightWheel - the rear right WheelController

    • Method Detail

      • drive

        public void drive(double leftSpeed,
                  double rightSpeed)
        Set the left and right speeds of the robot using the specified values. For the FourWheelDriveController, leftSpeed sets both left WheelControllers and rightSpeed sets both right WheelControllers.
        Specified by:
        drive in class DriveController
        Parameters:
        leftSpeed - the speed of the left side of the robot
        rightSpeed - the speed of the right side of the robot

      • drive

        public void drive(double frontLeftSpeed,
                  double frontRightSpeed,
                  double rearLeftSpeed,
                  double rearRightSpeed)
        Sets the speeds of all four WheelControllers independently.
        Parameters:
        frontLeftSpeed - the speed of the front left wheel
        frontRightSpeed - the speed of the front right wheel
        rearLeftSpeed - the speed of the rear left wheel
        rearRightSpeed - the speed of the rear right wheel
